# **Tender Announcement: Supply and Delivery of Runway De-Icing and Anti-Icing Compounds**

## Notice Details

A public tender notice for the supply and delivery of runway de-icing and anti-icing compounds for airfield pavements has been issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

### Tender Reference

* **Reference Number:** WS4142044860-Doc4198546525
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4142044860
* **Public Posting Date:** 2023-09-12
* **Closing Date:** 2023-10-11T14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)

### Description

A National Master Standing Offer (NMSO) is sought for the supply, delivery, and off-loading of runway de-icing/anti-icing compounds for airfield pavements. The tender targets the establishment of a standing offer for the Department of National Defence (DND) and other federal government departments and agencies.

### Requirements

* The expected delivery locations are across Canada.
* Conditional Indigenous Limited Bidding applies to this Request for Standing Offer.

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority:** Chad Bellerdine, Public Services and Procurement Canada
* **Email:** chad.bellerdine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17428335

### CP or IO Eligibility 

This tender is eligible for both CP or Indigenous and Not-for-Profit organization benefits. For more information please use the attached notice document.
